title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, environmental laws and policies - role of government; Environmental laws for managing Air, water, land, wastewater, solid waste, hazardous waste, natural resources, energy, ecology and environment. Environmental guidelines and regulations, environmental auditing, monitoring, reporting, economics and accounting; Theories of corporate strategy and environmental policy; Beyond environmentalism, sustainability issues; Role of government and non-government organizations and citizens.
